snippet: Ray Rice had two long touchdown runs Sunday, steadying Baltimore to a victory over the Cincinnati Bengals that gave the Ravens their third A.F.C. North title and the No. 2 seed in the playoffs.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Baltimore Ravens defeat Cincinnati Bengals, 24-16, to clinch AFC North title and first-round bye in playoffs; other NFL results noted.
lead_paragraph: Ray Rice had two long touchdown runs Sunday, steadying Baltimore to a victory over the Cincinnati Bengals that gave the Ravens their third A.F.C. North title and the No. 2 seed in the playoffs.

headline.main: Ravens Clinch Bye, but Bengals Tag Along to Playoffs
headline.print_headline: Ravens Clinch Bye, but Bengals Tag Along to Playoffs
